thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Classic business option for NYC
thread.title_full: Classic business option for NYC - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: letsgofire
title: Classic business option for NYC
text:
I've been staying at this hotel for many years. This hotel is remarkably consistent for me in terms of service, SPG treatment and so on. I enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar. I also like the fitness center, which will a bit small, is somewhat large for NYC. The location is efficient for Midtown meetings. The rooms are quiet, comfortable and have those shades for blocking out the Times Square lights.
This is my top choice for a midtown business hotel.
